name: Scarlett
description: Scarlett is the Modified Version of WhatsAsena, Made By @iamcyberporali with Baileys.

Scarlett_CODE.description: Type the code when you got by scanning QR through WhatsApp.

SUDO.description: Leave blank if you don't know how to use it! Sudo mode; Your number must be an international number. So you should have your number after the country code. Example: 91xxxxxxxxx,0

YT_PASSWORD.description: enter the password. The password is afamk.

BGM_FILTER.description: If you likes bgm you can write 'true'. Otherwise false

AUTO_STICKER.description: If you likes bgm you can write 'true'. Otherwise false

SCARLETT 1.description: Set the alive message two name

SCARLETT 2.description: Set the Alive message first name

INBO_BLOCK.description: Inbox Blocking System. True koduthal ningalude pml vann chila bad words upoayogikunnavare bot block aakum block aakendengil false kodukuka

WELCOME.description: You can select welcome as gif/pp

WEL_GIF.description: Fill here any gif link if you selected gif as WELCOME

GIF_BYE.description: Fill here any gif link if you selected gif as BYE

TAG_REPLY.description: Enter jid of your number so that you get a audio reply when metioned example - 91xxxxxxxxxx@s.whatsapp.net - for india

BGM_DURATION.description: FUNNY BGM DURATION  codded by SAIDALI

AUTO_BÄ°O.description: Set true for auto date, time in biography.

BAD_WORDS.description: enter the word you dont allow in your group

CHAT_BOT.description: Turn your account into a chatbot! .Scarlett on/off

FIX_ERROR.description: Set true if you don't want to see error log.

SEND_READ.description: Write true if you want to throw seen.

ALL_CAPTION.description: Caption for images and videos generated by pinky bot

HEROKU.description: If it is running in Heroku, type true.

MUTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Mute Message! Use => default, to change back.

EMOJI_COMMAND.description: You can change Command list emojis.)

EMOJI_DESCRIPTION.description: You can change command list emojis.)

EMOJI_EXAMPLE.description: You can change command list emojis.)

EMOJI_WARNING.description: You can change command list emojis.)

PANEL_COMMAND.description: You can change command list name eg:menu,help etc...)

BLOCK_CHAT.description: Choose in which chat the bot won't work there. Ex: 905xxxx && 905xxxx-1xxx or 905xxxx,905xxx...

UNMUTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Unmute Message! Use => default, to change back.

BLOCK_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Block Message! Use => default, to change back.

UNBLOCK_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Unblock Message! Use => default, to change back.

WORK_TYPE.description: Scarlett Working Type. If you use â€œpublicâ€, everyone can use the bot. Else if you use â€œprivateâ€, only you can use your bot.

OWNER_NAME.description: reply for .owner ! give your details, Use => default, to change back.

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Enter the owner number, You must enter your number, Please don't enter the number with country code ( example : 91 for indian ) Also don't enter space & + on the number ( example : 919782xxxx for indian ). ( This number will be shown on some commands )

NUMBER.description: Enter the owner number, You must enter your number, Please don't enter the number with country code ( example : 91 for indian ) Also don't enter space & + on the number ( example : 91996132xxxx for indian ). ( This number will be shown on some commands )

ALIVE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Alive Message! Use => default, to change back.

BAN_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Ban Message! Don't use  .ban command it will ban your number. Use => default, to change back.

SONGDOWNLOADING.description: Customizable song DOWNLOADING message instead of 'Dowloading your song'

SONGUPLOADING.description: Customizable song UPLOADING message instead of 'Uploading your song'

ADD_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Add Message! If you use it may cause ban your number.  Use => default, to change back.

KICKME_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Kickme Message! Use => default, to change back.

PROMOTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Promote Message! Use => default, to change back.

DEMOTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Demote Message! Use => default, to change back.

AFK_MESSAGE.description: Customizable AFK Message! Use => default, to change back.
